function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Workers unable to arrive at construction sites due to pandemic restrictions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hiring less qualified workforce due to pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of financial support from the government for construction companies.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding qualified construction workers due to the pandemic.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in well-being","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited knowledge about the influence of vaccination campaigns","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Debates about living and working patterns in the built environment may lead to inadequate implementation of disease prevention measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor hygiene habits levels","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the connection between built environment and disease
